title: Upscaling Completes at 0%
body:
## Environment Information

|Module|Version|
|-|-|
|`video2x`| 2.9.0-win32-full |
|`ffmpeg`| ffmpeg-20190729-43891ea-win64-static |
|`waifu2x-caffe`| ver 1.2.0.2 |
|`waifu2x-converter-cpp`| Not Available |

## Symptom

First time using Video2x it worked with no problem, ever since then it won't upscale and says it's completed upscaling in the command window.  It just sits there doing nothing and have to close it manually, which leaves all the temp folders undeleted.

Here is the current settings i am using (Have tried multiple others):
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53840981/62585340-3eddf800-b8b0-11e9-86d6-c75792521f2a.png)

OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
GPU: AMD Radeon VII 
Driver: 19.7.5 (Also used older driver 19.7.3)


## Screenshots or Error Messages
